moves.1. c4: I started with the English opening
moves.1... a5: which then for strange reason he moved to A5
moves.2. Nc3: I then thought I would get my knights out
moves.2... Ra6: then he moved his rook and I was totally confused as to what he might be up to
moves.3. e3: I then moved to e4 so next I could move my C4 pawn to attack the rook with bishop on F1
moves.3... Re6: he then moved his rook to E6
moves.4. Nb5: I moved Knight to B5 so after then move to A7 to attack the Bishop
moves.4... Nc6: He then moved his Knight out to prevent that
moves.5. Be2: I decided to bring my bishop out to develop my pieces
moves.5... Nb4 6. a3: I then moved to A3 to force his Knight to move back
moves.6... Nc6 7. Nf3: I then brought my Knight out so I could castle should I need to
moves.7... d5: He then moved to D5 to attack my C4 Pawn
moves.8. c5: I decided to decline as if I took he could of taken it with then queen and he would of developed his Queen and would then have a Rook and Queen out
moves.8... d4: He carried on pushing the pawn forward
moves.9. Bc4: which then I brought my Bishop out to attack the Rook
moves.9... Rg6 10. Nh4: then I did the same but with the Knight
moves.10... Rg4: he the attacked my knight with his Rook
moves.11. Qf3: I then decided to attack the F7 square with my Queen and let him have the Knight
moves.11... g5: instead of taking he decided to attack it with Pawn also
moves.12. Qxf7+: Which then I went to the F7 square
moves.12... Kd7: which he then only had one move KD7
moves.13. Be6#:
which then I mated him with Be6
